title: Advertizing finite commutative semigroups
abstract:
Finite commutative semigroups $S$ (akin to the better known group case) have
a neat structure as well. Apart from a trimmed proof of the general framework,
the structural details of many concrete f.c. semigroups $S$ are unraveled. They
come in two types. First, the subtle multiplicative semigroups $(Z_n,\bullet)$
(as opposed to their bland siblings $(Z_n,+)$). Second, semigroups defined by
generators and relations. Altogether six open questions stimulate further
research.
